mapper.update: update seat set seatSale=#{seatSale} where seatNum=${seatNum}
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from seat where theatherNum=#{theatherNum}

select t.theatherNum theatherNum, count(*) cnt from theather t, seat s, branch b where t.theatherNum=s.theatherNum and t.branchNum=b.branchnum and t.branchnum=#{branchNum} group by t.theathernum, b.branchNum
select (select count(*) from seat where theatherNum=#{theatherNum})-(select nvl(count(*),0) from book where mScheduleNum=#{mscheduleNum}) from dual

select DISTINCT s.*,(select count(*) from book b where b.mschedulenum=m.mschedulenum and m.mschedulenum=#{mscheduleNum}) booking from seat s,mschedule m where s.theathernum=#{theatherNum} and s.theathernum=m.theathernum
